message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,000.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. I'm now offering $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and our previous discussions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,500.

I understand that you're still trying to make a profit, Alice, but I'm getting close to my budget limit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $10,500. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm now offering the product to you for $11,750.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $10,750. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $10,750. I'm willing to make one final offer to you. I'm now offering the product to you for $11,250.

I'm really close to my budget limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but I can only go up to $10,500. If you're not willing to sell at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8,000.
